sentences.english: I crept up the stairs and peered into the office of optical shop.
sentences.chinese: 我爬上樓梯，眯縫着眼看了看眼鏡店的辦公室。

sentences.english: He narrowed his eyes and answered in a flat tone.
sentences.chinese: 他眯縫着眼睛，用平淡的聲調做了回答。

sentences.english: When you look at the sun, you have to squint at it.
sentences.chinese: 當你看太陽時，你得眯縫眼看。

sentences.english: She narrows her eyes at me.
